targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "date" AS time,
  weight_kg
FROM personal_data.weights
WHERE 
user_id = ${user}
AND date NOT IN (SELECT date FROM personal_data.date_exclusions WHERE user_id = ${user})
ORDER BY "date"

SELECT
	 count(date)
	FROM (
	  SELECT
	    date
			FROM personal_data.food_entries
		WHERE $__timeFilter(date) AND user_id = ${user} 
		AND date NOT IN (SELECT date FROM personal_data.date_exclusions WHERE user_id = ${user})
	  GROUP BY date
	)

SELECT
  "date" AS time,
  weight_kg
FROM personal_data.weights
WHERE $__timeFilter(date) AND user_id = ${user} 
AND date NOT IN (SELECT date FROM personal_data.date_exclusions WHERE user_id = ${user})
ORDER BY "date"

select SUM( W / 9) AS "Estimated weight loss"  from (
	SELECT
	  f.date,
		f.total_calories - e.total_calories  as W
	 -- COALESCE(f.total_calories, 0) - COALESCE(e.total_calories, 0)  as W
	FROM (
	  SELECT
	    date,
	    SUM(Calories) AS total_calories
	  FROM personal_data.food_entries
		WHERE $__timeFilter(date) AND user_id = ${user} 
		AND date NOT IN (SELECT date FROM personal_data.date_exclusions WHERE user_id = ${user})
	  GROUP BY date
	) f
	FULL OUTER JOIN (
	  SELECT
	    date,
	    SUM(Calories) AS total_calories
	  FROM personal_data.exercise_entries
		WHERE $__timeFilter(date) AND user_id = ${user} 
		AND date NOT IN (SELECT date FROM personal_data.date_exclusions WHERE user_id = ${user})
	  GROUP BY date
	) e
	ON f.date = e.date
	ORDER BY f.date
)

SELECT
  date AS time,
  SUM(calories) AS "Calories Consumed"
FROM personal_data.food_entries
WHERE $__timeFilter(date) and user_id = ${user}
AND date NOT IN (SELECT date FROM personal_data.date_exclusions WHERE user_id = ${user})
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date

SELECT
  date AS time,
  SUM(calories) AS "Calories Burned"
FROM personal_data.exercise_entries
WHERE $__timeFilter(date) and user_id = ${user}
AND date NOT IN (SELECT date FROM personal_data.date_exclusions WHERE user_id = ${user})
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date

SELECT
  date AS time,
  SUM(calories) AS "Breakfast"
FROM personal_data.food_entries
WHERE $__timeFilter(date) and user_id = ${user} and meal_type = 'Breakfast'
AND date NOT IN (SELECT date FROM personal_data.date_exclusions WHERE user_id = ${user})
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date

SELECT
  date AS time,
  SUM(calories) AS "Lunch"
FROM personal_data.food_entries
WHERE $__timeFilter(date) and user_id = ${user} and meal_type = 'Lunch'
AND date NOT IN (SELECT date FROM personal_data.date_exclusions WHERE user_id = ${user})
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date

SELECT
  date AS time,
  SUM(calories) AS "Dinner"
FROM personal_data.food_entries
WHERE $__timeFilter(date) and user_id = ${user} and meal_type = 'Dinner'
AND date NOT IN (SELECT date FROM personal_data.date_exclusions WHERE user_id = ${user})
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date

SELECT
  date AS time,
  SUM(calories) AS "Snacks"
FROM personal_data.food_entries
WHERE $__timeFilter(date) and user_id = ${user} and meal_type = 'Other'
AND date NOT IN (SELECT date FROM personal_data.date_exclusions WHERE user_id = ${user})
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date

SELECT 
  meal_type, 
  AVG(calories) AS "Calories" FROM (

            SELECT
              meal_type, 
              SUM(calories) AS "calories"
            FROM personal_data.food_entries
            WHERE $__timeFilter(date) and user_id = ${user}
            GROUP BY meal_type, date

  ) GROUP BY meal_type

SELECT
  date AS time,   
  SUM(calories) AS "Breakfast"
FROM personal_data.food_entries
WHERE $__timeFilter(date) and user_id = ${user} and meal_type = 'Breakfast'
AND date NOT IN (SELECT date FROM personal_data.date_exclusions WHERE user_id = ${user})
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date

SELECT
  date AS time,
  SUM(calories) AS "Lunch"
FROM personal_data.food_entries
WHERE $__timeFilter(date) and user_id = ${user} and meal_type = 'Lunch'
AND date NOT IN (SELECT date FROM personal_data.date_exclusions WHERE user_id = ${user})
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date

SELECT
  date AS time,
  SUM(calories) AS "Dinner"
FROM personal_data.food_entries
WHERE $__timeFilter(date) and user_id = ${user} and meal_type = 'Dinner'
AND date NOT IN (SELECT date FROM personal_data.date_exclusions WHERE user_id = ${user})
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date

SELECT
  date AS time,
  SUM(calories) AS "Snacks"
FROM personal_data.food_entries
WHERE $__timeFilter(date) and user_id = ${user} and meal_type = 'Other'
AND date NOT IN (SELECT date FROM personal_data.date_exclusions WHERE user_id = ${user})
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date

SELECT
e.time, coalesce("meals count", 0) as "meals count"
FROM (
SELECT
  date AS time,
  count (distinct meal_type) as "meals count"
FROM personal_data.food_entries 
WHERE $__timeFilter(date) and user_id = ${user}
AND date NOT IN (SELECT date FROM personal_data.date_exclusions WHERE user_id = ${user})
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date
) f
FULL OUTER JOIN (
  SELECT
  date AS time
  FROM personal_data.exercise_entries ee  
  WHERE $__timeFilter(date) and   user_id = ${user}
  AND date NOT IN (SELECT date FROM personal_data.date_exclusions WHERE user_id = ${user})
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date
) e
ON f.time = e.time
ORDER BY e.time

SELECT
  date AS time,
  SUM(calories) AS "Calories Consumed"
FROM personal_data.food_entries
WHERE $__timeFilter(date) and user_id = ${user}
AND date NOT IN (SELECT date FROM personal_data.date_exclusions WHERE user_id = ${user})
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date

SELECT
  date AS time,
  SUM(calories) AS "Calories Burned"
FROM personal_data.exercise_entries
WHERE $__timeFilter(date) and user_id = ${user}
AND date NOT IN (SELECT date FROM personal_data.date_exclusions WHERE user_id = ${user})
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date

WITH consumed AS (
    SELECT
        date::date AS time,
        SUM(calories) AS calories_consumed
    FROM personal_data.food_entries
    WHERE $__timeFilter(date) AND user_id = ${user}
    GROUP BY date
),
burned AS (
    SELECT
        date::date AS time,
        SUM(calories) AS calories_burned
    FROM personal_data.exercise_entries
    WHERE $__timeFilter(date) AND user_id = ${user}
    GROUP BY date
)

SELECT
    COALESCE(c.time, b.time) AS time,
    calories_consumed - calories_burned  AS "Calories Balance"
   -- COALESCE(c.calories_consumed, 0) - COALESCE(b.calories_burned, 0) AS "Calories Balance"
FROM consumed c
FULL OUTER JOIN burned b ON c.time = b.time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  TO_CHAR(COALESCE(f.date, e.date), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS date,
  COALESCE(f.total_calories, 0) AS "Consumed",
  COALESCE(e.total_calories, 0) AS "Burned",
  f.total_calories - e.total_calories AS "Balance"
  --COALESCE(f.total_calories, 0) - COALESCE(e.total_calories, 0) AS "Balance"
FROM (
  SELECT
    date,
    SUM(Calories) AS total_calories
  FROM personal_data.food_entries
  WHERE $__timeFilter(date) AND user_id = ${user}
  GROUP BY date
) f
FULL OUTER JOIN (
  SELECT
    date,
    SUM(Calories) AS total_calories
  FROM personal_data.exercise_entries
  WHERE $__timeFilter(date) AND user_id = ${user}
  GROUP BY date
) e
ON f.date = e.date
ORDER BY date

SELECT
  COALESCE(f.date, e.date) AS time,
  COALESCE(f.total_calories, 0) AS "Calories Consumed (AVG)",
  COALESCE(e.total_calories, 0) AS "Calories Burned (AVG)",
  COALESCE(f.total_calories, 0) - COALESCE(e.total_calories, 0) AS "Calorie Balance (AVG)"
FROM (
  SELECT
    date,
    SUM(Calories) AS total_calories
  FROM personal_data.food_entries
  WHERE $__timeFilter(date) AND user_id = ${user} 
  AND date NOT IN (SELECT date FROM personal_data.date_exclusions WHERE user_id = ${user})
  GROUP BY date
) f
FULL OUTER JOIN (
  SELECT
    date,
    SUM(Calories) AS total_calories
  FROM personal_data.exercise_entries
  WHERE $__timeFilter(date) AND user_id = ${user} 
  AND date NOT IN (SELECT date FROM personal_data.date_exclusions WHERE user_id = ${user})
  GROUP BY date
) e
ON f.date = e.date
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  COALESCE(f.date, e.date) AS time,
  COALESCE(f.total_calories, 0) AS "Calories Consumed (Total)",
  COALESCE(e.total_calories, 0) AS "Calories Burned (Total)",
  COALESCE(f.total_calories, 0) - COALESCE(e.total_calories, 0) AS "Calorie Balance (Total)"
FROM (
  SELECT
    date,
    SUM(Calories) AS total_calories
  FROM personal_data.food_entries
  WHERE $__timeFilter(date) AND user_id = ${user} 
  AND date NOT IN (SELECT date FROM personal_data.date_exclusions WHERE user_id = ${user})
  GROUP BY date
) f
FULL OUTER JOIN (
  SELECT
    date,
    SUM(Calories) AS total_calories
  FROM personal_data.exercise_entries
  WHERE $__timeFilter(date) AND user_id = ${user} 
  AND date NOT IN (SELECT date FROM personal_data.date_exclusions WHERE user_id = ${user})
  GROUP BY date
) e
ON f.date = e.date
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  date AS time,
  SUM(fat) AS "Fats",
  SUM(carbohydrate) AS "Carbs",
  SUM(protein) AS "Proteins"
FROM personal_data.food_entries
WHERE $__timeFilter(date) and user_id = ${user}
AND date NOT IN (SELECT date FROM personal_data.date_exclusions WHERE user_id = ${user})
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date

SELECT  
  ROUND((SUM(fat) * 9) * 100.0 / NULLIF((SUM(fat) * 9 + SUM(carbohydrate) * 4 + SUM(protein) * 4), 0), 1) AS fats,
  ROUND((SUM(carbohydrate) * 4) * 100.0 / NULLIF((SUM(fat) * 9 + SUM(carbohydrate) * 4 + SUM(protein) * 4), 0), 1) AS carbs,
  ROUND((SUM(protein) * 4) * 100.0 / NULLIF((SUM(fat) * 9 + SUM(carbohydrate) * 4 + SUM(protein) * 4), 0), 1) AS proteins    
FROM
  personal_data.food_entries f
WHERE $__timeFilter(date) and user_id = ${user};

SELECT
  date AS time,
  SUM(fat) AS "Fats",
  SUM(carbohydrate) AS "Carbs",
  SUM(protein) AS "Proteins",
  SUM(fiber) AS "Fibers"

FROM personal_data.food_entries
WHERE $__timeFilter(date) and user_id = ${user}
AND date NOT IN (SELECT date FROM personal_data.date_exclusions WHERE user_id = ${user})
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date

SELECT
  TO_CHAR(date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS date,
  SUM(fat) AS "Fats, g",
  SUM(carbohydrate) AS "Carbs, g",
  SUM(protein) AS "Proteins, g",
  SUM(fiber) AS "Fibers, g"

FROM personal_data.food_entries
WHERE $__timeFilter(date) and user_id = ${user}
AND date NOT IN (SELECT date FROM personal_data.date_exclusions WHERE user_id = ${user})
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date desc

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT u.fatsecret_user_id AS __text, u.id AS __value
FROM personal_data.users u
JOIN personal_data.weights w ON w.user_id = u.id
ORDER BY u.fatsecret_user_id;
list.name: user
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT u.fatsecret_user_id AS __text, u.id AS __value
FROM personal_data.users u
JOIN personal_data.weights w ON w.user_id = u.id
ORDER BY u.fatsecret_user_id;
